title: The perfect gift for Apple lovers! This Apple Watch band is only $40 and has a MagSafe charger built-in
content:
Macworld

Any Apple lover knows the best thing about their Apple Watches is their convenience. They put the power of your iPhone right on your wrist, so you don’t always have to have your iPhone in your hand. 

But as much as Apple Watches offer, the only downside is that you must be tethered to a wall to power them up. That is, unless you have the PowerBand, an Apple Watch band with a built-in MagSafe magnetic wireless charger. 

With the PowerBand, you can charge your Apple Watch on the go. Compatible with all Apple Watch series, you can use the integrated MagSafe charger on the band, allowing you to quickly charge your Apple Watch with its quick-release charging mechanism.

But that’s not all. Give your PowerBand a flick to reveal the flexible USB connector, which you can connect to a USB outlet via your computer, a power bank, or a wall to get back up to 100% power. You’ll barely even notice the charger in the comfortable nylon weave band, which is fully adjustable and highly elastic for extra comfort.

This holiday, gift yourself or a fellow Apple lover an accessory designed to enhance their Apple Watch.

Get the PowerBand with built-in MagSafe charging for just $39.99 for a limited time!
